snippet.title: Anchors - A playable memoir about the developer's struggle with passive suicidality
snippet.description:
Play for free on itch.io https://serif-games.itch.io/anchors?ac=qfCyYFQF-tw?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt Content warning: Themes of suicide and suicide ideation. 

"Anchors is the result of a decade of self examination and processing of a very real period of my life where I was passively suicidal. This project is me coming to terms with those feelings and finally expressing them in a constructive way." - serif_

➡️ More from serif https://serif-games.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More story-based experiences https://itch.io/games/tag-narrative?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames
